mapper.select: SELECT P_NAME,MIN(P_FILESRC) P_FILESRC,P_PRICE FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY P_NAME,P_PRICE
SELECT P_NAME,P_FILESRC,P_COLOR FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_NAME=#{param1} GROUP BY P_NAME,P_FILESRC,P_COLOR
SELECT P_NO,P_NAME,P_PRICE,P_CNT,P_COLOR,P_SIZE,P_FILESRC FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_NAME=#{param1} AND P_FILESRC=#{param2}
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET P_CNT=P_CNT-#{param2} WHERE P_NO=#{param1}
mapper.select: SELECT 판매량,P_COLOR,P_NAME,P_FILESRC,P_PRICE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, BESTSELL.* FROM (SELECT SUM(OM.U_CNT) 판매량,P.P_COLOR,P.P_NAME,P.P_FILESRC,P.P_PRICE FROM ORDER_MEMBER OM, PRODUCT P WHERE OM.P_NO=P.P_NO GROUP BY P.P_COLOR,P.P_NAME,P.P_FILESRC,P.P_PRICE ORDER BY 판매량 DESC) BESTSELL) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_NAME LIKE '%'||#{param1}||'%' OR P_COLOR LIKE '%'||#{param1}||'%' OR P_SIZE LIKE '%'||#{param1}||'%' OR P_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{param1}||'%' OR P_INFO LIKE '%'||#{param1}||'%'

SELECT BB.P_NO,P.P_COLOR,P.P_SIZE,P.P_NAME,P.P_FILESRC,P.P_PRICE FROM (SELECT P_NO,BESTHH FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, BESTSELL.* FROM (SELECT P_NO,SUM(U_CNT) BESTHH FROM ORDER_MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(OM_DATE,'HH24')=#{param1} AND OM_STATE='구매확정' GROUP BY P_NO ORDER BY BESTHH DESC) BESTSELL) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5) BB, PRODUCT P WHERE BB.P_NO=P.P_NO
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{param1}||'%'
